actions.title: Planting
actions.description: Document planting activities for any plant type including trees, seedlings, shrubs, or other vegetation. Record species information and provide photographic evidence of the plot before and after planting.

media.title: Photograph the Plot
media.description: Please take a photo of the location where you will be planting Seedlings or Saplings.

details.title: Input Planting Details
details.description: Please provide the following details about the planting process.
details.feedbackPlaceholder: Provide feedback or any issues during the planting process

inputs.title: Plant Species/Name
inputs.placeholder: Enter the plant species (e.g., Acacia, Eucalyptus, Pine)

inputs.title: How many plants were planted?
inputs.placeholder: Enter the number of plants planted

review.title: Review Planting Details
review.description: Please review the details you have provided before submitting.

actions.title: Identify Plant
actions.description: Identify and observe plants in their environment. Document species information, health status, and environmental conditions. This action helps track biodiversity and ecosystem health over time.

media.title: Capture Plant Photos
media.description: Please take photos of the plants you are identifying. Document their current state and any notable features.

details.title: Input Plant Identification Details
details.description: Please provide the following details about the plant you are identifying.
details.feedbackPlaceholder: Provide feedback or any observations during this process

inputs.title: Plant Species/Name
inputs.placeholder: Enter the plant species or custom name (e.g., Oak Tree in North Garden)

inputs.title: Number of Plants Identified
inputs.placeholder: Enter the number of plants identified

review.title: Review Plant Identification Details
review.description: Please review the details you have provided before submitting.

actions.title: Waste Cleanup
actions.description: Document waste removal activities including type, quantity, and estimated weight. Helps maintain clean environments and track waste reduction impact.

media.title: Capture the Waste Cleanup
media.description: Please take a photo of the location where you will be picking up the waste. You can also take photos of the waste to document its condition.

details.title: Input Waste Cleanup Details
details.description: Please provide the following details about the waste cleanup process.
details.feedbackPlaceholder: Provide feedback or any issues during the waste cleanup process

inputs.title: Waste Type
inputs.placeholder: Select the different waste picked up

inputs.title: Waste Removed
inputs.placeholder: Enter the number of pieces of waste removed

inputs.title: Estimated Weight (kg)
inputs.placeholder: Estimate the total weight of waste collected

review.title: Review Waste Cleanup
review.description: Please review the details you have provided before submitting.
